tool_description: Parse PNR and GDS information do JSON. Supports Amadeus, Sabre and Travelport (Galileo and Worldspan). Also, contain methods to request airports with IATA codes.
name: EasyPNR
title: EasyPNR

api_list.name: /v4/airports/{iatacode}

required_parameters.name: iatacode
required_parameters.description: A three letters Airport IATA code.

api_list.name: /v4/airports
api_list.description: Get all Airports with IATA codes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easypnr.p.rapidapi.com/v4/airports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easypnr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://easypnr.p.rapidapi.com/v4/airports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easypnr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
